text: Olivia Edward (born January 25, 2007) is an American actress who plays the role of Duke in the FX television series Better Things. The casting director for Better Things got Edward on Crazy Ex-Girlfriend on The CW. She is the daughter of John Edward, a television personality, author and psychic medium. She is from Long Island. Edward also dances and sings. She has said that she is inspired by watching Pamela Adlon direct and act in Better Things. ==References== == External links == * Category:2007 births Category:American child actresses Category:Living people Category:People from Long Island Category:American television actresses Category:21st-century American actresses
title: Olivia Edward
